body_html: Hi @ramonh – thanks! I'm not sure if we have a test example that checks the branch nested under the if application_draft.ready?. Could you check if there is and if not add a simple view test for it? (located in spec/views). Don't hesitate to ping me for further questions – thanks in advance 😄

body: Hi @ramonh – thanks! I'm not sure if we have a test example that checks the branch nested under the `if application_draft.ready?`. Could you check if there is and if not add a simple view test for it? (located in `spec/views`). Don't hesitate to ping me for further questions – thanks in advance :smile:
